程序包 utm

类 ExtendedTM

java.lang.Object
utm.TuringMachine
utm.ExtendedTM
public class ExtendedTM extends TuringMachine
The class implements more elegant variable rules.
版本:
0.0.1
作者:
Mingchong Li

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ExtendedTM

      public ExtendedTM(int rulesNumber, String initialState, String acceptState, String rejectState)
      Creates a TM with no rules.
      参数:
      rulesNumber - The number of rules that the machine will have.
      initialState - A string representing the TM's initial state.
      acceptState - A string representing the TM's accept state.
      rejectState - A string representing the TM's reject state.
